textContents: Average standardized crime rates, standard deviations from the mean
Percentage of nation that believes in heaven minus percentage that believes in hell, percentage points
Source: "Divergent Effects of Beliefs in Heaven and Hell on National Crime Rates", by Azim Shariff and Mijke Rhemtulla, 2012
*Based on data from 67 countries, World Values and European Values surveys from 1981-2007 and UNODC 2003-10
